name: Language
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Text
Page
Language
description:
Language

A language within a detected text (OCR). See Text#pages.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision"

vision = Google::Cloud::Vision.new

image = vision.image "path/to/text.png"
text = image.text
page = text.pages.first

language = page.languages.first
language.code #=> "en"
